title: Ornn's 'Siblings'
body:
So with the recent teases for our new Champion Ornn, I've been gathering what we can get about this guy and I think I have a pretty reasonable bit of his backstory.

Firstly, Ornn's poem not only describes how he is a really big god of the forge for the Freljord, but behind it is also a story about the three sisters. Sharjo, had recently dropped some hints about Ornn, revealing how he's really big, really hot, and how the Freljord think he and his siblings are 'gods' in a sense.

My guess, Ornn is the younger/older brother of the three sisters, Avarosa, Serylda and Lissandra. Why? Well the story behind the paper, though mostly covered up, roughly tells of how Ornn rejects the three sisters and goes off to build his own 'kingdom' away from the tribes. This is a slightly far-fetched theory, but it seems kinda resonable.

Not saying what, bc I did not flesh it out at all, and cut it entirely to focus on more pressing matters, like "how long is his beard?" and "what do spiced cherries actually taste like" and "how does he view the human race?". 

I do think in a Runeterra there is room for a star-forging cosmic dragon to do battle with/work alongside with a forge-god. It's a hook I wanted to keep around for future writers to connect some dots, or to circle back around to one day.
